app.title: SAM 3D Body â†’ Unity FBX
app.heading: ğŸ§â€â™‚ï¸ SAM 3D Body â†’ Unity Humanoid FBX
features: Generate Unity Humanoid-compatible FBX files from a single image
Generate multi-frame animations from MP4 videos
usage: Upload an image or MP4 video
Download the generated FBX â†’ Import to Unity
Upload your own bboxes and camera intrinsics file from gta-link, boxmot, colmap
For video, you may or may not want root motion for your armature - check the box if you do
Apply standard mocap-style smoothing to the animation via Refinement. Enabled by defaultwith some customizable settings.
You may also create a visualization video of the animation for debugging purposes.

ui.fov_method_info: Default: Built-in, runs every frame | File: Load from cameras.txt | Sample: Average from images
ui.fov_file: ğŸ“ Camera Intrinsics File (COLMAP cameras.txt or MoGe format)
ui.sample_number_info: Number of images to sample and average for FOV estimation
ui.body_param_sample_num_info: Number of frames to sample and average for body parameters

refinement.title: Refinement
refinement.max_pos_speed_info: Maximum positional speed (units/sec) for spike detection
refinement.max_pos_accel_info: Maximum positional acceleration (units/secÂ²) for spike detection
refinement.max_ang_speed_deg_info: Maximum angular speed (deg/sec) for spike detection
refinement.max_ang_accel_deg_info: Maximum angular acceleration (deg/secÂ²) for spike detection
refinement.one_euro_min_cutoff_info: Minimum cutoff frequency for One Euro filter
refinement.one_euro_beta_info: Speed coefficient for One Euro filter
refinement.one_euro_d_cutoff_info: Derivative cutoff frequency for One Euro filter
refinement.root_cutoff_xy_hz_info: Cutoff frequency for horizontal (XY) root motion
refinement.root_cutoff_z_hz_info: Cutoff frequency for vertical (Z) root motion
refinement.interpolate_missing_keyframes_info: When enabled, missing frames (where no people were detected) will be interpolated using slerp for rotations and linear interpolation for vectors. When disabled, missing frames are skipped during refinement.

errors.bbox_file_required: BBOX file must be provided when 'use bbox' is enabled
errors.num_people_required: Number of people must be greater than 0
errors.camera_intrinsics_required: Camera intrinsics file must be provided when FOV method is 'File'
errors.fov_estimator_required: FOV estimator must be loaded to use 'Sample' method. Please ensure FOV estimator is initialized.
